description:
I just love young, hot, cocky guys. There's something about a guy who's fresh, healthy, and full of life that's really appealing.
That's how Fuller is. He's incredibly beautiful, with a hot body and face, and he's very confident and outgoing.
At the tender age of 19, he claims to have done a bunch of self-defense and martial arts training, including Marine basic training, Navy Seal training, and self-defense camps.
I didn't catch that he was ever in the military, so I'm not sure how that works.
But who the fuck cares? He's just so darn cute!
title: Fuller
